item.title: Ok i got a rofling problem wit emote tabs
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

ok, replace all the emotes with this:

		case 168:
			// yes emote
			if (emotes == 0) {
				emotes = 1;
				pEmote = 0x357;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			break;

		case 169:
			// no emote

item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok when i go to emote tabs i see teleprots like jad and etc ok i wan’t to change but dunno how it is difrent tha n the others sources…

Ok how do i eddit this?

case 169: if(teleblock == true){ //Made by musicmad441 sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand(""); //made by Musicmad441 }

Delete it? if i wan’t to remove bot if i like to add a new one?? ty if u can’ help
